sub_title: Sales Manager and Account Manager with over 15 years of experience internationally
summary: Words that describe me are: communicative, commercial, energetic, professional, loyal. I have over 15 years of experience as an (International) Account Manager and later Sales Manager, leading ateam of Account Managers. My experience lays in International Business, Language Travel and International Education and in my latest job I acquired a lot of experience dealing with governments and townships in order to counsel them on Inclusion and Accessability for disabled people.

awards.title: Best Student of the Year
awards.description: I was chosen Best Student of my year when obtaining my Bachelor Degree at Fontys Economische Hogescholen Tilburg. My final thesis, which was an Export Plan, was rewarded a 9 (grades from 1-10).

awards.title: Winner Project: "Succesvol de Grens Over"
awards.description: Project International Business (as part of IBL studies) in collaboration with the Chamber of Commerce at Respond BV in Tilburg. Product: Export Plan. Successful completion, valued by the Chamber of Commerce as Best Project of the Year.

profile_positions.description:
Ongehinderd is een maatschappelijk gedreven onderneming die zich inzet voor een toegankelijker Nederland. Mede opgericht door BNN Bikkel Gerard de Nooij die op zijn 23ste door een motorongeval een dwarslaesie opliep. Na zijn revalidatie ervaart hij letterlijk welke drempels er in het alledaagse leven zijn nu hij gebruik maakt van een rolstoel. Hij besluit niet bij de pakken neer te gaan zitten en richt Ongehinderd op.

Ongehinderd heeft een app en website waarmee mensen met een lichamelijke beperking altijd en overal inzicht krijgen in de toegankelijkheid van publieke locaties. Door het keuringsteam worden locaties getoetst in opdracht van gemeenten en bedrijven. Daarnaast is Ongehinderd de uitvoerende partij voor het Nederlands Keurmerk voor Toegankelijkheid. De informatie is in de gratis app en op de website te vinden, waar inmiddels tienduizenden gebruikers beoordelingen plaatsen.
profile_positions.title: Account Manager

profile_positions.description: Na een aantal jaren als accountmanager (Adviseur Beleid & Toegankelijkheid) gewerkt te hebben, heb ik per april 2021 de rol van Manager aangenomen om het team aan te sturen en samen met hen te bouwen aan een toegankelijk Nederland voor iedereen. Dit was een interim positie voor een jaar.
profile_positions.title: Manager Beleid & Toegankelijkheid

profile_positions.description:
•	Responsible for Marketing, Sales and Account Management. I was responsible for setting up collaborations with agents and tour operators and the development of our agency network. Achieved representation by the key-players in our main markets: Germany, Switzerland, The Netherlands, Italy, UK. Some of my tasks and responsibilities were:
•	Development of the Marketing Strategy and supervision and implementation of the Marketing Plan
•	Account management – (agents, tour operators, and other key clients)
•	Product development. – Creator of the innovative product PeachTravelingSchool, which is the first Traveling Spanish Language School in Spain 
•	Expansion of agency network worldwide
•	Creation of marketing materials, such as brochures, flyers, banners, websites, presentations, giveaways, etc.
•	Attending international education workshops and B2B fairs worldwide
•	Visiting agents for joint promotions and/or product trainings for employees
•	Direct Marketing (e.g. Website, social media, mailings & newsletters)
•	Attending national and international B2C fairs
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder and Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
Academia Columbus-Solexico, now known under the name Don Quijote, runs 7 Spanish Schools in Latin-America to teach this beautiful language to foreigners. Besides a language-learning program Academia Columbus offers a multicultural, divers and life-changing experience that will transform those who take part in it. Our aim is to make sure that the learning is not merely confined to the classroom, but that Playa del Carmen, Quito and San José become their schools: "Living and learning Spanish!".

As the Marketing Director I am responsible for Marketing and Sales. 
•	Responsible for Marketing, Sales and Account Mangement. I was responsible for maintaining close contact with our international agents and for the expansion of our agency network. Some of my tasks and responsibilities were:
•	Development of the Marketing Strategy and supervision and implementation of the Marketing Plan
•	Account management (agents)
•	Product development
•	Expansion of agency network worldwide
•	Creation of marketing materials, such as brochures, websites, presentations, giveaways, etc.
•	Attending international education workshops and fairs worldwide
•	Visiting agents for joint promotions and/or product trainings for employees
•	Direct Marketing (e.g. website, social media, fairs, mailings & newsletters)
profile_positions.title: Marketing and Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
Founded in 1971 Malaca Instituto has gained an enviable international reputation and is widely recognised as being one of the best Spanish language schools in Spain. We aim to provide our students with quality teaching and facilities and do so in surroundings and in an atmosphere conducive to study and relaxation. 

•	Responsible for market research, market development, account management and sales in the following territory: USA, Canada, Brazil, The Netherlands, Belgium, Italy, Austria, Poland, Hungary, Bulgaria and other Eastern-European countries.
•	An important part of it consisted of agent visits and participation and representation of the company in international workshops (congresses) and fairs in international education.
•	Contribution to the development of the Marketing Strategy and implementation of the Marketing Plan.
profile_positions.title: Account Manager
